Package game.racers

Class Racer

java.lang.Object
game.racers.Racer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Airplane, Bicycle, Car, Helicopter, Horse, RowBoat, SpeedBoat
public abstract class Racer extends Object implements Runnable, Cloneable
The general Racer type abstract class, used to store racer details for specific Racer types.
Version:
3 08 June 2023
Author:
Yovel Nirenberg 318276177, Arbel Zagag 315316794
See Also:
  • AerialRacer
  • LandRacer
  • NavalRacer

    • run

      public void run()
      Executes the logic for the Racer's movement. The Racer moves until its currentLocation reaches the finish location. During each iteration, the thread sleeps for a specified duration and then moves the Racer. Once the Racer finishes the race, the "finished" property is changed to "Yes" and the Racer is marked as crossing the finish line in the arena.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
